conbody.p: In the event that incorrect keys for a secondary CLC are used, Eucalyptus behaves as if that CLC no longer exists. The current primary CLC continues to operate as expected. In order to bring back the secondary CLC, perform the following tasks.

ol.li: Stop the secondary CLC. service eucalyptus-cloud stop
On the secondary CLC, delete all files from /var/lib/eucalyptus/db.
On the secondary CLC, delete all .pem and vtunpass files from var/lib/eucalyptus/keys.
Start the secondary CLC. service eucalyptus-cloud start
Re-register the secondary CLC with the primary CLC. /usr/sbin/euca_conf --register-cloud --partition eucalyptus --host <clc_#2_IP_address> --component <clc_name>
